content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) with no current ingredients to smelt.

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store coal, and is connected to the coal mine.

### Coal Transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that transports coal from the chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) to the chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### Additional Coal Storage at positions(x=44.5, y=-81.5) and (x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of chests at positions(x=44.5, y=-81.5) and (x=45.5, y=-80.5) to store additional coal.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item being extracted before attempting to extract it.
### Errors when a mining drill is out of fuel
- Make sure to insert fuel into the mining drill to continue mining.
### Errors when a chest at the drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when an inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to transport items.
